Item ID1351

The Bronze axe is the weakest axe in Gielinor. It can be wielded for combat, or used to cut trees in Woodcutting. It requires an Attack level of 1 to be equipped, and a Woodcutting level of 1 to be used.

Players can make a bronze axe with the Smithing skill at level 1 using one Bronze bar, giving the player 12.5 Smithing experience. Players can take one for free at the chicken farm by the Lumbridge cow field (lodged in a stump).

A free spawn is located outside Fred the Farmer's house in Lumbridge (lodged in a stump). One can also be obtained by talking to the Woodsman tutor.

Various activities require the use of an any axe, such as chopping Kraken tentacles on the Fishing Trawler, defeating the growthlings during the Bryophyta boss fight, or cutting bruma roots to fight Wintertodt. A bronze axe is available to the player from the nearby environment in these activities: on the Fishing Trawler from a crate marked axes, at Bryophyta from a pile of logs, and at Wintertodt from a crate.

Date Changes
11 September 2014
(update | poll)

Random event ents no longer spawn and axes can no longer be broken.

26 January –
27 June 2005

The item's examine was changed from "A woodcutters axe." to "A woodcutter's axe."
